observation: Phoenix Property Management and Property Managers, Phoenix Houses and Homes for Rent | Mosaic Property Management  Skip Navigation 480-588-9500 Get a Quote Owner Login Tenant Login Blog Home Property Management Our Services Mosaic Difference Multi-Family Property Management Areas We Serve Rentals Available Rentals Urban Falls Owners Owner Resources Owner FAQs Owner Portal Residents Resident Resources Maintenance Pay Rent Agents About Who We Are Core Values Testimonials Contact Us MENU Youtube Twitter Facebook Instagram A Higher Standard in We offer a full range of services for Homeowners and Investors, starting at $75/Month. Free Rental Analysis Property Search Our The Mosaic Explore What We Do As your Phoenix Property Manager MARKETING Marketing is key to successful rentals. We provide an expert market analysis for each property we manage to maximize your return on investment. TENANT SCREENING We conduct extensive screening on all tenants and handle every aspect of getting your investment rented in the shortest time possible. RENT COLLECTION We make sure you get paid on time, every time. You no longer have to worry about rent showing up in your bank account. MAINTENANCE We conduct inspections upon move-in and move-out and ensure all maintenance issues are addressed in a timely manner. FINANCIAL REPORTING With our detailed financial reporting tools, it's never been easier to keep tabs on your investment. EVICTION PROTECTION In the unfortunate event that a tenant needs to be evicted from your rental, we will shield you from the stress and re-rent the property promptly. Mosaic Is Always There For You! Discover why Phoenix Owners & Renters trust Mosaic powered by BirdEye What Sets Us Apart Why choose Mosaic Low Monthly Fees The #1 Way to Protect Your Investment 6 Month Tenant Guarantee $3,000.00 Pet Damage Guarantee Get a Management Quote Earning Your Trust Our goal is to handle each property individually and as if it were our own. Our number one focus is earning your trust. From day one our focus is to begin building that trust and once we earn it, maintain it. If we cannot develop a relationship based on trust, then our owner – property manager relationship will fail. When working
